title: Reasons for extinction of bird species

content.question: Which of the following is the most likely reason that the greatest number of extinctions of bird species occurred in the period 1901-2000?

choices.label: Pollution was becoming so widespread that many birds migrated to new habitats.
Increased environmental disturbances from human activities altered bird habitats.
Adaptive radiation produced many new species of birds.
Animals were being domesticated, leading to the agricultural revolution.
Ecosystems were changing rapidly because of widespread glaciation.

content.answer: Increased environmental disturbances from human activities altered bird habitats.
